 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוּס‎</span><sub>160</sub> **verb** ==flee, escape== (Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***tremble*** (rare), compare [[BDB#Brock|Brock]]; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***move to and fro, be in commotion, dangle***, [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>2866</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָס‎</span> [[Num.35.25|Num 35:25]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַ֫סְתָּה‎</span> [[2Kgs.9.3|2Kgs 9:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַ֫סְתִּי‎</span> [[1Sam.4.16|1Sam 4:16]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָנוּס‎</span> [[Exod.21.13|Exod 21:13]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּנָ֫ס‎</span> [[Gen.39.12|Gen 39:12]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְנוּס֑וּן‎</span> [[Ps.104.7|Ps 104:7]], etc.; ***Imperative masculine plural*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֻ֫סוּ‎</span> [[Jer.48.6|Jer 48:6]] + 4 t. Jeremiah, Zechariah; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺס‎</span> [[2Sam.18.3|2Sam 18:3]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָנוּס‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָנֻס‎</span>) [[Gen.19.20|Gen 19:20]] +; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָס‎</span> [[Amos.9.1|Amos 9:1]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָסִים‎</span> [[Exod.14.27|Exod 14:27]] +; — 

**1.** ***flee***, absolute [[Gen.39.12|Gen 39:12]]; [[Gen.39.15|Gen 39:15]]; [[Num.16.34|Num 16:34]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]); [[Josh.10.16|Josh 10:16]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); [[Lev.26.17|Lev 26:17]]; [[Lev.26.36|Lev 26:36]] ([[BDB#H|H]]); figurative of sea [[Ps.114.3|Ps 114:3]]; [[Ps.114.5|Ps 114:5]] compare [[Ps.104.7|Ps 104:7]] followed by accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָנוֺס‎</span> [[Jer.46.5|Jer 46:5]], followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּרֶךְ‎</span> [[Josh.8.15|Josh 8:15]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[2Kgs.9.27|2Kgs 9:27]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּדֶרֶךְ‎</span> [[Deut.28.7|Deut 28:7]]; [[Deut.28.25|Deut 28:25]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלנַֿפְשָׁם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[2Kgs.7.7|2Kgs 7:7]] ***flee for their life***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּרַגְלָיו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span>, [[Judg.4.15|Judg 4:15]] ***flee on foot***; + 44 t. absolute (not elsewhere Hexateuch); followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> location [[Deut.4.42|Deut 4:42]]; [[Deut.19.5|Deut 19:5]]; [[Deut.19.11|Deut 19:11]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), [[Num.35.32|Num 35:32]]; [[Josh.20.4|Josh 20:4]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]), [[Judg.4.17|Judg 4:17]]; [[1Kgs.2.28|1Kgs 2:28]]; [[1Kgs.2.29|1Kgs 2:29]]; [[Isa.13.14|Isa 13:14]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[1Sam.4.10|1Sam 4:10]] + 6 t. + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִקְרָאתוֺ‎</span> [[Exod.14.27|Exod 14:27]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; not elsewhere Hexateuch); followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַד‎</span> [[Judg.7.22|Judg 7:22]] + [[Prov.28.17|Prov 28:17]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַדבּֿוֺר‎</span>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּוֺר‎</span>); followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> [[Isa.10.3|Isa 10:3]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ָ  ה‎</span> locative [[Gen.14.10|Gen 14:10]] + 4 t. [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]], [[Num.35.6|Num 35:6]] + 6 t. [[BDB#P|P]], [[Deut.4.42|Deut 4:42]]; [[Deut.19.3|Deut 19:3]]; [[Deut.19.4|Deut 19:4]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), + 6 t.; followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם‎</span> [[Isa.20.6|Isa 20:6]] followed by accusative of location [[Josh.8.20|Josh 8:20]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), + 4 t.; followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמֶּרְחָק‎</span> [[Isa.17.13|Isa 17:13]] = ***far away***; followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> from, [[Josh.20.6|Josh 20:6]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[1Sam.4.16|1Sam 4:16]] + 3 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתּוֺךְ‎</span> [[Jer.51.6|Jer 51:6]] especially <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span> ***from before*** [[Exod.4.3|Exod 4:3]]; [[Exod.14.25|Exod 14:25]]; [[Num.10.35|Num 10:35]]; [[Josh.10.11|Josh 10:11]] (all [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Sam.17.24|1Sam 17:24]]; [[Jer.48.44|Jer 48:44]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַנָּס‎</span>, &gt; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הניס‎</span>), + 19 t.; followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> [[Josh.7.4|Josh 7:4]]; [[Josh.8.5|Josh 8:5]] (twice in verse); [[Josh.8.6|Josh 8:6]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Sam.4.17|1Sam 4:17]]; [[2Sam.24.13|2Sam 24:13]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלִּפְנֵי‎</span> [[1Chr.19.18|1Chr 19:18]]. 

**2.** ***escape*** [[Amos.9.1|Amos 9:1]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נמלט‎</span>) so [[Jer.46.6|Jer 46:6]] hence 

**3.** ***take flight, depart, disappear***, only figurative; [[Deut.34.7|Deut 34:7]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]) ***his freshness*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵחֹה‎</span> ***vigour***) ***was not gone*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא כָֽהֲתָה עינו‎</span>); of shadows (at evening), [[Song.2.17|Song 2:17]]; [[Song.4.6|Song 4:6]] of sorrow etc. [[Isa.35.10|Isa 35:10]]; [[Isa.51.11|Isa 51:11]]. 

**4.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלסֿוּס‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Isa.30.16|Isa 30:16]] ***fly*** (to the attack) ***on horseback***. **Po\`lel** ***Perfect*** [[Isa.59.19|Isa 59:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹסֲסָה בּוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ י‎</span> ***the breath of*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ***driveth at it, driveth it on*** (compare **Hiph\`il 2**). **Hithpo\`l.** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהִתְנוֺסֵס‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span> [[Ps.60.6|Ps 60:6]] ***in order to take flight before*** the bow (so [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#Hup|Hup-Now]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] and others). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵנִיס‎</span> [[Exod.9.20|Exod 9:20]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָנִיסוּ‎</span> [[Deut.32.30|Deut 32:30]] + [[Judg.7.21|Judg 7:21]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּנוּסוּ‎</span> **Qal**); ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְתָנִיס‎</span> [[Judg.6.11|Judg 6:11]] — 

**1.** ***put to flight***, followed by accusative [[Deut.32.30|Deut 32:30]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רדף‎</span>). 

**2.** ***drive hastily*** to a safe place [[Exod.9.20|Exod 9:20]], followed by accusative + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span>. 

**3.** ***cause to disappear, hide*** [[Judg.6.11|Judg 6:11]] (no object expressed) followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span>.
